assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Incon Co., Ltd. provides integrated surveillance solutions in South Korea. The company offers traffic services, such as traffic information collection, analysis, and expectation, as well as illegal parking crackdown and delinquent vehicle detention; surveillance services, including smart police, GIS map radar tracking, and CCTV video extraction management; facility management services, such as asset management, error monitoring, and control management; disaster prevention services, including disaster prevention monitoring that consists of fire, flood, and accident, as well as real-time disaster report and alarm; and eco service, such as water pollution monitoring and food waste management based on RFID. It also provides Internet of Things, big data, system integration, and video security services. The company was formerly known as Win4net Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Incon Co., Ltd. in March 2015. Incon Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
